scripts.build:chrome: rm -rf build/chrome && cp -r build/bundle/ build/chrome && cp build/chrome/config/manifest.chrome.json build/chrome/manifest.json && rm -rf build/chrome/config
scripts.build:firefox: rm -rf build/firefox && cp -r build/bundle/ build/firefox && cp build/firefox/config/manifest.firefox.json build/firefox/manifest.json && rm -rf build/firefox/config
scripts.build: pnpm build:bundle && pnpm build:chrome && pnpm build:firefox
scripts.package: mkdir out && pnpm package || pnpm package:chrome && pnpm package:firefox
